mapper.select: SELECT ZRMS_YM , (SELECT ZNM FROM ZSD7_LOGIN WHERE MANDT = '300' AND KUNNR = A.ZEMP_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS ZEMP_NM , ZEMP_ID , ZREGION , (SELECT NAME1 FROM ZFIT010 WHERE MANDT = '300' AND BRANCH = A.ZREGION) AS ZREGION_NM , ZDEPT_ID , (SELECT NAME1 FROM ZFIT010 WHERE MANDT = '300' AND BRANCH = A.ZDEPT_ID) AS ZDEPT_NM , ZDEPT_BRCH_ID , ZLC_NM , KUNNR , ZMBR_NM , (SELECT ZCODENM FROM ZSD_COCDT WHERE MANDT = '300' AND ZGRCODE = 'C128' AND ZCODE = A.ZREQ_GB) AS ZREQ_GB , ZSMS_SEND_DT , ZREC_NAME , SUBSTR(REPLACE(SCP.DEC_B64('DAMO','SID','NIST_TEL', ZREC_TEL), '-', ''), 0, 3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(SCP.DEC_B64('DAMO','SID','NIST_TEL', ZREC_TEL), '-', ''), 8, 4) AS ZREC_TEL , ZREC_TEL AS ZREC_ENC_TEL , NVL((SELECT ZCODENM FROM ZSD_COCDT WHERE MANDT = '300' AND ZGRCODE = 'C009' AND ZCODE = A.ZREC_CONN), ' ') AS ZREC_CONN , NVL(DECODE(ZAPPR_STATE, 'A', '결제완료', 'C', '결제취소', '미결제'), ' ') AS ZAPPR_STATE , NVL(ZAPPR_NO, ' ') AS ZAPPR_NO , NVL(ZAPPR_DT, ' ') AS ZAPPR_DT , NVL(DECODE(ZAPPR_TYPE, '0', '간편결제', '1', '카드', '3', '카드', ZAPPR_TYPE), ' ') AS ZAPPR_TYPE , NVL(TO_CHAR(ZAPPR_AMT), ' ') AS ZAPPR_AMT FROM ZSD7_RMS_PAY_D A WHERE MANDT = '300' AND ZRMS_YM = #{zreq_ym_b} AND ZREC_TEL = #{zrec_enc_tel}
